column2: Response options to "What barriers, if any, have prevented you from making more changes to your lifestyle to help tackle environmental issues?"
I think large polluters should change before individuals
I do not feel it is my personal responsibility
I do not think I will have any effect on environmental issues
I think environmental issues are exaggerated
I do not believe in climate change
I am not interested
I do not think eco-friendly alternatives are as good
It is too expensive
I do not have the time
I do not know what more I could do
Other, please specify
No reason
